name: QuickFitWorkout
0:
”Alexa, Start Quick Fit Workout”
”Alexa, Tell Quick Fit Workout to do Core”
”Alexa, Lets do Full Body with Quick Fit Workout”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick fit workout
des:
QuickFit Workout is a perfect skill for getting some quick and randomized exercises in for the day at home! There's an arsenal of different exercises depending on what you want to do! Just ask Alexa to "Start Quick Fit Workout." Each set provides an always randomized order of exercises to follow and will track reps for you per workout. Each exercise is proven to increase energy levels, improve metabolism, lower stress levels, and helps to burn fat. So why not!! do a QuickFit workout when you're bored or don't have enough time to go to the gym!!

At any point if you need a break, need to take phone call, or anything, you can always tell Alexa to pause and the skill will close and save where you left off. Upon opening Alexa will ask whether you finished your workout, and continue on from there! The Alexa Companion app is used with this skill, and can be found here:

here are IOS and Android Links,
Andriod: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.amazon.dee.app&hl=en
IOS (Iphone): https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/amazon-alexa/id944011620?mt=8
_________________________________________
Update: 
The Leaderboard was found to be slowing down QuickFit Workout's performance and will be in rework! It will return next update!
_________________________________________
Features:

To hear all commands, just say,
-"Alexa, show me all commands"
-"Alexa, hear all commands"
-"Alexa, tell me the commands"

Skips (Upto 3 skips allowed)
-"Alexa, Skip this workout"
-"Skip this"
-"Alexa, Skip that workout!"

Quick Mode - Shortens Alexa's pre workout phrases
Music Mode - turns music on/off
Workout Mode - changes workout from 16 to 8 (or vice versa) exercises

_________________________________________

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
